Primary Contact: Lynda Asselstine Sr., Manager and Director of Care; Email: lyndacaringforpeople@shaw.ca
Service Details: - Provides respite, transitional and long-term care for adults with acquired brain injuries - Provides a safe, supportive environment that allows a client to enhance his/her quality of life - Assists the individual to accept his/her new status and focus on recovery- Offers an individualized rehabilitation program that includes physical, cognitive, social, spiritual and community involvement
